name: git-workflow
description: Validates git workflow knowledge - branch naming, worktrees, commit conventions

tests.prompt: What branch naming conventions does aidevops use? List the branch type prefixes. Answer concisely.
When and why should you use git worktrees in aidevops? Answer concisely.
What commit message format does aidevops use? List the conventional commit prefixes. Answer concisely.
What happens if you try to edit files while on the main branch? Answer concisely.
